Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Purified total RNA from fresh or frozen clinical tissue specimens
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Affymetrix Gene Profiling Reagents used to prepare labeled RNA targets for gene expression analysis on Affymetrix microarray systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for preparation of labeled cRNA targets from purified total RNA from fresh or frozen clinical tissue specimens for hybridization to Affymetrix GeneChip microarrays and fluorescence measurement using Affymetrix GeneChip Instrumentation System; for use with FDA-cleared Affymetrix GeneChip microarray assays specifying these reagents
